title: Personalized Japanese Learning Path for Auditory Learners at Intermediate Level
description: This personalized learning path is designed for auditory learners with an intermediate level of expertise in Japanese. The path focuses on enhancing listening and speaking skills while building upon basic concepts.
goals: Enhance speaking fluency and conversational skills
Expand vocabulary and understanding of Japanese grammar

milestones.title: Basic Conversational Phrases
milestones.description: Learn essential conversational phrases in Japanese for daily interactions.

milestones.title: Listening Comprehension Practice
milestones.description: Practice listening to native Japanese speakers to improve comprehension skills.
skills_gained: Ability to understand spoken Japanese at a moderate pace

milestones.title: Expanding Vocabulary
milestones.description: Learn new words and phrases to enhance your Japanese language proficiency.
skills_gained: Ability to express ideas more fluently

milestones.title: Grammar and Sentence Structure
milestones.description: Focus on understanding Japanese grammar rules and sentence structures.

prerequisites: Basic familiarity with hiragana and katakana
Understanding of basic Japanese greetings and expressions
